com.rambilight.core.api.ui

Class TrayController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rambilight.core.api.ui.TrayController

  • public class TrayController
extends java.lang.Object
    A controller for the tray. Also provides methods for creating compatible menu items. This should NOT be re-instantiated by a module since it might cause problems.
